column4: is azureus in repos old or is it a backport of the latest vuze to azureus?
it is and old version I think, you can check that in the launchpad page
https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/azureus  as you can see, the one in the repos in 2.5.4.0 however you can run latest tar.gz and it works okay.

there is one little issue though, that current azureus 3.0.x.x uses some newer version of the SWT graphical libraries, so it spits errors sometimes, but hasn't affected me. However I haven't tried vuze, so I don't know if it'll work fine.
